S

scorePair(PairInstance) - Method in class elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.PronounMatchSieve
Scores the Salience of the pairInstance: +100 if the antecedent is a named entity +20 if mention and antecedent are in the same Sentence +170 if the antecedent is the Subject of its clause +70 if the antecedent is the Accusative Object of its clause +50 if the antecedent is the Dative or Genitive Object of its clause +35 if the mention and the Antecedent have the same grammatical function
sentenceDistance(PairInstance) - Method in class elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.Sieve
Compute if sentences in which mention and antecedent appear are not more than 3 sentences apart.

SpeakerIdentificationSieve - Class in elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve
This sieve matches speakers to compatible pronouns A speaker can either be to the left or right of a speech part Speaker and compatible pronoun in speech have to have the same number and cannot be more than one sentence apart A: "..."

StrictHeadMatchASieve - Class in elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve
This Sieve links a Mention to an antecedent, if its head word matches any head word of the antecedents Discourse Entity.

StringMatchSieve - Class in elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve
This model links two mentions only if their strings match exactly, including pre- and post-modifiers and determiners.
